name: discord-merge-notification
title: Notify Discord on Merge
description: Sends a Discord webhook notification when a branch is merged into main. Uses repository secret DISCORD_WEBHOOK. Optionally mentions a role via DISCORD_ROLE_ID.
author: byui-formula-hybrid

secrets.name: DISCORD_WEBHOOK
secrets.description: Discord webhook URL. Store as a repository or organization secret and map to the called workflow when using `uses:`.

secrets.name: DISCORD_ROLE_ID
secrets.description: Numeric role id to mention (e.g. 1245089722351489044). If provided, the workflow will prepend a role mention.

usage: For cross-repo calls, map the secrets in the caller workflow under `secrets:` when using `uses:`. For same-repo use, add the secrets to the repository settings.
